main event: At Bunker Hill AFB in Indiana on 27 June 1957, a ground-radar observation reported several yellow-colored objects the size of a grapefruit that remained stationary before abruptly disappearing.
interesting points: The objects were observed through the radar scope, indicating a technological means of detection.
The objects were described as staying stationary for a period before disappearing, suggesting controlled movement.
The report indicates a precise observation duration of 5-10 minutes, providing detailed information on the sighting.
No physical objects or debris were reported, leaving the nature of the yellow-colored objects unexplained.
The report lacks information on any follow-up investigations or conclusions about the sighting.
sighted object: several yellow-colored objects the size of grapefruits
